Title: A Bloody Inheritance
Description:
When the kobyss killed my parents, they stole some of their most cherished things. 

Not me, obviously. Cherished items. 

While we are murdering kobyss, let's find them.
ObjectivesText: Retrieve Alyza's parents' items in the Hungering Pool in Hallowfall.
RewardText:
Well done. Far more useful than those other adults who told me not to do this.

"But Alyza, the kobyss are dangerous. You'll die." Stupid adults, thinking they know best.

Are you ready to kill the big one? I'm ready to kill the big one.
